The basilisk is an eight-legged reptile with a nasty disposition and the ability to turn creatures to stone with its gaze. Folklore holds that, much like for the cockatrice, the first basilisks hatched from leathery eggs laid by snakes and incubated by roosters, but little in the basilisk's physiology lends any credence to this claim.

A basilisk prefers to eat petrified flesh. Once a victim has been turned to stone, the basilisk crunches the fossilized corpse with its powerful jaws and lets its potent stomach acids do the rest. This digestive process is extremely slow and inefficient, causing the basilisk to move so lethargically that it appears as if in mid-petrification itself. This has even led to the saying "as slow as a well-fed basilisk." Certainly basilisks are well-known for their slow gait and slothful nature, but a predator that can turn its prey to stone with a glance hardly has much need for speed.

An adult basilisk is 13 feet long from head to tail and weighs roughly 300 pounds. These reptiles make hissing sounds when moving about that turns to a guttural gurgle when they're agitated. Though they are normally solitary creatures that come together only to mate and lay eggs, there are periodic reports of regions being infested with unusual numbers of basilisks. What causes these unusual congregations of basilisk activity is unknown.

For unknown reasons, weasels and ferrets are immune to the basilisk's stare, and they sometimes sneak into basilisk lairs while a parent is hunting in order to consume eggs or freshly hatched young. Some legends suggest that a basilisk's blood can transmute common stones into other material, but this is likely a case of witnesses misinterpreting the magical restoration of previously petrified creatures or body parts.

Rat Empathy.name: 鼠类认同 Rat Empathy
Rat Empathy.description: 吉特恩能够与啮齿动物进行沟通。

Change Shape.name: 变形 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
• 人类
    • 近战 拳击[[/r 1d20+24 #Fist]]{+24} (灵巧，非致命), 伤害 @Damage[(1d4+10)[bludgeoning]]
  • 鼠
    • 体型 小型
    • 速度 30尺，攀爬10尺

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Curse of the Wererat.name: 鼠化人诅咒 Curse of the Wererat
Curse of the Wererat.description:
此诅咒仅能影响类人生物。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

在每个月圆之夜，被诅咒的生物必须尝试另一次强韧豁免，失败则会变化为同种类的化形生物，直至黎明。

该生物会在GM的控制之下，并在后半夜横冲直撞，直至天明并失去知觉。

Deadly Aim.name: 致死瞄准 Deadly Aim
Deadly Aim.description:
需求 吉特恩本回合内还未尝试任何打击

效果 吉特恩对他的目标作出1次带有-2减值的远程打击。他在该次打击的伤害上获得+6环境加值。

Distracting Shot.name: 扰乱射击 Distracting Shot
Distracting Shot.description: 若吉特恩用远程武器对生物造成重击，或者用远程武器在同一个回合内至少命中相同生物 2 次，且该生物还是他用誓仇弓发誓毁灭的对象的话，那么到吉特恩的下个回合开始为止，该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Hunted Shot.name: 猎杀射击 Hunted Shot
Hunted Shot.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 吉特恩对目标作出2次远程誓仇弓打击。若2次均命中相同目标，则在判断抗力和弱点时，将两次伤害合并起来计算。他要如常将多重攻击减值应用至每次打击上。

Moon Frenzy.name: 满月狂乱 Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
当满月出现在夜空中时，化形生物必须变化为混合形态，在之后无法进行变形，体型增大1阶，触及增加5尺，啃咬（或类似的打击）伤害增加2点。

当月亮落下或太阳升起时，化形生物会变回类人形态，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]，持续[[/br 2d4 #Fatigued duration]]{2d4小时}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{效果：满月狂乱}

Targeting Shot.name: 标定射击 Targeting Shot
Targeting Shot.description:
需求 吉特恩当前正在承受多重攻击减值

效果 他忽略目标的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]状态和所有掩蔽。

Gedovius.name: 戈多威尔斯 Gedovius

equipment-Key to Area E4.name: 区域E4的钥匙 Key to Area E4

Clawed Feet.name: 脚爪 Clawed Feet
Clawed Feet.description:
触发 石像鬼正在飞行，并且一个生物进入它下方相邻方格。

效果 石像鬼对触发目标进行一次爪抓打击。

Dread Striker.name: 惊骇袭击者 Dread Striker
Dread Striker.description: 在对抗戈多威尔斯的攻击时，任何陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]状态的生物还被视为处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Intimidating Prowess.name: 威逼 Intimidating Prowess
Intimidating Prowess.description: 戈多威尔斯在尝试对目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]时，能忽略不具有相同语言而带来的减值。

Rip and Rend.name: 连撕带扯 Rip and Rend
Rip and Rend.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 戈多威尔斯的上个动作是对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的目标造成偷袭伤害的近战打击

效果 戈多威尔斯对目标造成@Damage[6d6[bleed]]伤害

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 戈多威尔斯对陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成3d6点额外精准伤害。

Statue.name: 雕像 Statue
Statue.description: 直至戈多威尔斯下次行动为止，他看起来就如同一座雕像。当他伪装成雕像时，其欺骗检定以及DC会自动得到44的结果。

Gedovius.publicNotes:
石像鬼是由石头构成的怪兽猎手，他们白天在城市里的众目睽睽之下扮演雕像，晚上袭击不幸的路人。它们最常见的形态是长着角和蝙蝠翅膀的人形生物，但每个石像鬼的差别其实很多，有些看起来或多或少像人形，另外一些则不可名状。一只石像鬼的外表特征不是一成不变的，居住在城市的石像鬼在同一地点逗留足够长时间之后，会一天天慢慢变化以适应当地的建筑风格。这些具有耐心的怪物会伪装很长一段时间，只为了等待一次攻击机会。

石像鬼往往是独行猎手，尽管有时候他们为了保护或娱乐而组成被称为“翼（Wings）”的部落。在极少数情况下，“翼”会成为一个相对稳定的社群，甚至可能和其他生物结盟，例如恶魔或具有智慧的异怪，尽管这种同盟随时都会有破裂的危险。大多数石像鬼都奸诈而具有报复心，这导致他们不可能维持长久的盟友关系。很多石像鬼都有一些强迫症或怪癖，有些是收集癖，涉猎范围包含从书籍到恐怖的战利品，另一些则很注重仪式感，对小众知识领域或某个艺术主题过于热情。这些独特的个性冲突常常会导致他们的“翼”分崩离析。

General Avinash Jurrg.name: General Avinash Jurrg
General Avinash Jurrg.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Battlefield Command.name: Battlefield Command
Battlefield Command.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect General Jurrg roars out a simple command during battle, using his supernatural power to force a foe within 30 feet to pursue a tactic in combat. The targeted creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save and is thereafter temporarily immune to new Battlefield Commands for 24 hours.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as their mind rails against the command.

Failure The creature must spend 1 action at the start of their turn to perform a basic action commanded by the general.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature must spend all 3 actions to perform basic actions commanded by the general. At the end of their turn, they must save against Battlefield Command again to determine how the effect continues into their next turn, but each time this save is attempted the DC is reduced by 2.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The onidoshi takes on the appearance of an ogre. This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

General Avinash Jurrg.publicNotes: Onidoshi, or ogre mages, are oni with the material form of an ogre. Onidoshi's supernatural prowess and overwhelming intellect are enough to awe and cow entire families of rank-and-file ogres. Because of this, onidoshi are often found at the head of ogre war parties or orchestrating these violent campaigns from behind the scenes. It's rare for onidoshi to lead solitary existences, but those who do prefer to maraud the countryside or exploit villages and hoard the spoils for themselves.

Shame.name: 羞愧 Shame
Shame.description: 当一名幽灵守卫攻击的目标看起来像是精灵或是卡莉丝翠的信徒时，他会感到羞愧。尝试对幽灵守卫宽恕敌人时能够使用@Check[type:diplomacy|dc:39]检定或@Check[type:society|dc:39]检定。如果一名幽灵守卫受到宽恕敌人的大成功影响，他会在消失时叹一口气，其灵魂将被释放至来世。

Site Bound.name: 束缚之地 Site Bound
Site Bound.description: 典型的灵魂通常只能距离在他被杀死或作祟的地点很近的区域逗留。这个限制一般为120尺远。部分幽灵会被限制在对他来说具有特殊意义的房间、建筑、物品或生物上，而非具体的某个地点。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
杀死或宽恕娜芮莎能让幽灵守卫前往他们已被拖延了许久的来世，就如同在宽恕敌人中获得了大成功。

当幽灵被摧毁时，他会在[[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4天}后在被束缚的地点重新生成，生命值全满。只有在有人确定了幽灵存在的成因并纠正任何阻止幽灵安息的因素时，幽灵才能被永久摧毁。

Ectoplasmic Maneuver.name: 灵质战技 Ectoplasmic Maneuver
Ectoplasmic Maneuver.description: 幽灵守卫挥舞一股灵质抽打15尺内的一个目标，尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]敌人。他使用幽冥细剑打击代替运动检定来决定这次尝试的结果。

Frightful Moan.name: 骇人悲叹 Frightful Moan
Frightful Moan.description: 幽灵为自身的命运而哀悼，迫使@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]内的每个活物尝试1次@Check[type:will|dc:36]豁免。豁免失败时，该生物会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}（大失败则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}）。豁免成功时，该生物会在1分钟内临时免疫幽灵的骇人悲叹。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 幽灵守卫对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成3d6额外精准伤害。

Giant Trapdoor Spider.name: 巨螲蟷 Giant Trapdoor Spider
Giant Trapdoor Spider.publicNotes: 日常生活中很少有害虫像蜘蛛那样令人生畏
Giant Trapdoor Spider.blurb: 变体掠食蛛 Variant hunting spider

Giant Trapdoor Spider Venom.name: 巨螲蟷毒 Giant Trapdoor Spider Venom
Giant Trapdoor Spider Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续6 轮

阶段 1 @Damage[1d10[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard} (1 轮)

阶段 2 @Damage[1d12[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}, 和措手不及（1 轮）

阶段 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] 和 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1 轮)

Trapdoor Lunge.name: 螲蟷猛冲 Trapdoor Lunge
Trapdoor Lunge.description:
需求还未投掷先攻

触发 有生物进入到距离蜘蛛巢穴 25 尺范围内，此时蜘蛛恰好位于巢穴洞口厚实的蜘蛛丝盖子下方的位置，而且蜘蛛注意到了该生物

效果蜘蛛在投先攻之前行走或攀爬

Glyph of Warding (Kingmaker).name: 守卫刻文（拥王者） Glyph of Warding (Kingmaker)
Glyph of Warding (Kingmaker).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34]（受训）移除刻文而不触发它，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（7环级，反制DC34）以反制刻文。

Release Spell.name: 释放法术 Release Spell
Release Spell.description:
触发 有生物试图打开书桌抽屉或通往D6区的密门，会触发相关的刻文

效果 守卫刻文用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]攻击该生物（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|basic:true]豁免）。

Glyph of Warding (Kingmaker).hazarddescription: 一个沙漏状的刻文闪烁着淡紫色的光芒，然后似乎很快沙子就流走了，好像在表明时间突然耗尽。

Irritating Dander.name: 刺激性皮屑 Irritating Dander
Irritating Dander.description: 以非武装攻击命中地精犬、尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]地精犬或者以其他方式接触地精犬的生物会暴露于地精疹中。

Goblin Pox.name: 地精疹 Goblin Pox
Goblin Pox.description:
地精与地精犬（包括地精蝙蝠犬）免疫地精疹。

豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1 轮)

阶段2 恶心1且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1 轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}且无法将恶心值降低至1以下 (1 日)

Grabbles.name: 老抓 Grabbles

Self-Loathing.name: 自我厌恶 Self-Loathing
Self-Loathing.description: 怯懦小魔怪的自我厌恶让他很容易受到影响。他在对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]的检定时，其意志DC会受到-4减值。

Vermin Empathy.name: 虫类认同 Vermin Empathy
Vermin Empathy.description: 怯懦小魔怪能使用交涉来对节肢动物（昆虫、蜘蛛、蝎子、螃蟹以及类似的无脊椎动物）进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]。大多数节肢动物对怯懦小魔怪的起始态度为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fuG8dgthlDWfWjIA]。

Ride Tick.name: 骑乘蜱虫 Ride Tick
Ride Tick.description: 老抓在骑乘挠背时，能用交涉技能进行指挥动物。

Vengeful Anger.name: 复仇怒火 Vengeful Anger
Vengeful Anger.description: 只要未处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]状态，怯懦小魔怪在对抗先前伤害或折磨过自己的生物时，伤害检定就会获得+2状态加值。

Grabbles.publicNotes:
怯懦小魔怪，也被称为“螨精”，是一种自我厌恶且可怜的怯懦生物，他们很容易被其他生物、甚至是稍强一点的怯懦小魔怪领袖欺负并被奴役。他们会驯服昆虫、蜘蛛以及其他类似的生物作为可靠的盟友。怯懦小魔怪已经失去了大多数小魔怪祖先的魔法，只剩下这些内心充满疑惑和不安的缺陷存在。怯懦小魔怪在世界上其他最底层的生物中寻找同伴，并与虫类建立了友谊，而这也是唯一看起来愿意接受他们的存在。即便是在那些将怯懦小魔怪视为欺侮对象的社会中，也能够填补怯懦小魔怪的人格缺陷，因此他们很少抱怨或反抗，除非他们的愤怒已经超出能让自身崩溃的那个点。

小魔怪是残忍的精类骗子和破坏者，他们已经完全适应了主物质位面的生活，为自己那独特的破坏能力找到了适当的生态位。所有小魔怪都乐于破坏或摧毁东西，无论是有形的物体，诸如装置或交通工具；还是无形的事物，比如盟约或人际关系。对小魔怪来说，最大的乐趣就是看着复杂的造物分崩离析，而且这最好是在小魔怪作出的最轻微、最低限度且有针对性的推动下达成的。小魔怪会诋毁、欺负甚至屠杀较弱的同族，尤其是怯懦小魔怪，小魔怪（以及其他人）甚至会讥笑他们是“螨精”。

Grigori.name: 格里高利 Grigori
Grigori.publicNotes:
吟游诗人格里高利是一个富有魅力的演说家，同时也是一个皮塔克斯的间谍。他在PC们的王国之中执行间谍活动，试图破坏他们的权威。当PC们外出探险时，他便出现在都城里，并且立即开始发表演说，批评和诋毁PC们的领导和行动。越来越多的居民聚集在一起聆听他的演讲，随着时间的推移，他在镇上不满的定居者中获得了支持与威望。每当PC们的决定造成了一个赢家和一个输家，格里高利便利用他的天赋将焦点转移到这些决定的输家身上，并且以此激怒他们。当PC建设一个新的城市街区时，无论是对那些没能得到他们想要的人，还是那些认为这是一个负面结果的人，都被他对这最近发生的事件的可怕的描述而吸引。对格里高利合适的扮演将使他成为一个伴随在玩家身边的持续的倒刺，也将是他们最难忘怀的反派之一。格里高利小心翼翼地避免违反任何PC们制定的法律，在这情况下，即使PC们想要让他噤声，也没有合法的理由来逮捕他。

格里高利不仅是一个巡回演说家，他还是皮塔克斯之主伊洛维提国王派来的密探，他在镇上散布混乱和异议，目的就是为了推翻PC们，为皮塔克斯吞并此处铺平道路。为了掩盖他的踪迹并且保留合理的托词，伊洛维提使用了数层代理人来雇佣格里高利。据这名吟游诗人自己所知，是德雷勒夫堡的代理人雇佣并派遣他来这个西边的新兴小镇制造麻烦。

Rhetorical Spell.name: 掩饰法术 Rhetorical Spell
Rhetorical Spell.description: 如果格里高利使用的下一个动作为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell}，他尝试一次对抗所有观察者察觉DC的@Check[type:performance]检定。成功时，他将他的施法作为演讲的一部分隐藏起来，观察者不会意识到他在施展法术。

equipment-Lice-Infested Furs.name: 长满虱子的皮草 Lice-Infested Furs

Blinded.name: 目盲 Blinded
Blinded.description: 戈莫格的眼睛被琳翠刺伤了。随着时间的推移，他将会恢复视力（大部分），但是在这场战斗期间，他会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]状态。

Itchy.name: 瘙痒 Itchy
Itchy.description: 戈莫格这件充满虱子的皮草所导致的瘙痒不仅会通过分散注意力降低他的AC、反射豁免和攻击调整值（导致这些数值低于标准的食人魔战士），他在自己的每轮开始时还必须成功通过@Check[type:flat|dc:10]检定，用于避免本轮花费 2 个动作来疯狂抓挠自己的身体。成功通过纯骰检定后，他必须花费 1 个动作来抓挠身上的害虫。最后，由于虱子带来的不适所造成的副作用，戈莫格没法集中精神，导致不能正确地挥舞食人魔铁钩。尽管武器仍旧可以造成严重的伤害，但只要他身上仍旧瘙痒难耐，武器就不会应用正常情况下所具有的[致命]特征。

Gurija.name: 古丽佳 Gurija
Gurija.hp: 再生20（酸蚀或火焰使其无效）

Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Acid or.name: 再生20（酸蚀或火焰使其无效） Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Acid or Fire)

Sudden Stormburst.name: 风暴猝发 Sudden Stormburst
Sudden Stormburst.description:
需求 一名60尺内的盟友正在遭受持续火焰或酸蚀伤害。

效果 古丽佳在盟友周围召唤了一场局部性的暴雨，它能够冲刷掉任何酸性物质或是扑灭任何火焰，立即结束持续火焰或酸蚀伤害。

Hannis Drelev.name: 汉尼斯・德雷勒夫 Hannis Drelev
Hannis Drelev.publicNotes:
汉尼斯・德雷勒夫的整个青春都因缺乏晋升机会的沮丧而耗费在了布雷斡。当他听说嘉曼蒂女士正在寻找志愿者帮助她探索和平复失窃之地时，他看到了一个提升自己名望的机会。在那之后的几个月里，汉尼斯开始后悔自己的决定，现今他已经被迫向伊洛维提和阿玛格投降，他的性情从沮丧变为了彻彻底底的残忍。

德雷勒夫给人的印象是一个阴沉、贪婪、自负的人，他不满足于自己的命运，却总是蔑视那些比他拥有更少的人。不仅仅是精通于政治，男爵还自认为是一个熟练的剑客。他喜欢决斗，经常与自己的卫兵和高级军官对决。他喜欢炫耀、嘲笑和贬低那些被他压制的人，却会在别人对他占优时变得愤怒。

德雷勒夫是一个富有耐心的对手，以自己巧妙击败对手的能力为荣，他会以寓守于攻作为几乎每一个回合的起手。他酷爱卸除对手的武器，并且在面对持有武装的敌人时每轮都会尝试这么做，如果他成功了便会恶劣地嘲笑他们，如果失败了则会恶毒地诅咒他们。

equipment-Key Ring.name: 钥匙串 Key Ring
equipment-Key Ring.description: 包括了德雷勒夫要塞的所有锁的钥匙

Defensive Slice.name: 寓守于攻 Defensive Slice
Defensive Slice.description:
需求 德雷勒夫男爵在这一回合中尚未尝试过进行一次打击。

效果 德雷勒夫男爵使用他的武器摆出防御姿态，然后尝试一次近战打击。直到他的下个回合开始前，他在所有打击中承受-2状态罚值（包括本次打击），并且在他的AC上获得+2状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.EwhWYPCNM8bIIYEI]{效果: 寓守于攻}

Dramatic Disarm.name: 张扬卸武 Dramatic Disarm
Dramatic Disarm.description: 如果德雷勒夫男爵在对一名对手的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.ooiO59Ch2QaebOmc]{卸武 Disarm}运动检定中获得了大成功，他可以选择让被卸除的物品向随机方向飞出[[/r (1d4}*5 #feet]]{1d4 × 5尺}，而非掉落在对手所占据空间的地面上。如果这导致该物品掉落在至少拥有一只空闲手的生物的空间中，该生物可以尝试一次@Check[type:reflex|dc:20]检定来抓住该物品（否则它将掉落到该空间的地面上）。

Harrying Swordfighter.name: 扰人剑客 Harrying Swordfighter
Harrying Swordfighter.description: 德雷勒夫男爵在他所持握的所有剑类武器上添加缴械武器特征。

Skirmish Strike.name: 袭扰打击 Skirmish Strike
Skirmish Strike.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 德雷勒夫男爵快步然后打击，或者打击然后快步。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 德雷勒夫男爵对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成2d6额外精准伤害。

Focused Target.name: Focused Target
Focused Target.description: Happs designates a single creature he can see as his target; when he does so, he issues a litany of mockery at the target. Happs gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} the target, and the first time he hits the target in a round, he deals an additional 1d8 precision damage to the target. These effects last until Happs uses Focused Target again.

Hargulka.name: 哈古卡 Hargulka
Hargulka.publicNotes:
在娜芮莎使用怪异的操控手法侵入他的梦境并且增幅了他的野心之前，哈古卡就已经在巨魔中确立了自己的领袖地位，尽管他的目标从未超越过威胁他的巨魔随从们在周遭横冲直撞地收集食物和财宝，然后作为贡品带回给他。他的头脑中从未有过成为“国王”的概念，直到他做了一个栩栩如生、难以忘怀的梦，梦见自己坐在御座之上，沉浸恐惧和崇拜之中。在他的脚下，不仅有着巨魔，更有着大地精、鹰身女妖以及形形色色的留着口水的怪物们——这些生物可能会被视作危险的敌人，但在哈古卡看来，现在的它们只是他忠诚的奴仆。

对哈古卡而言，PC们的王国理所应当地属于他自己。他打算征服他们，把他们的首都据为己有，啖尝他们民众的肉与骨。尽管有着这样暴力的目标，这头巨魔却知道最好不要简单无脑地攻击他的敌人。相反，他把时间花在和他忠诚的巨魔们一同在荒野中寻找志同道合的怪物们，招募它们加入他的事业。作为其结果，哈古卡掌权的时间越长，失窃之地的怪物就会变得越发危险、越发得富有侵略性。

Dream of Rulership.name: 主宰之梦 Dream of Rulership
Dream of Rulership.description: 娜芮莎的启迪所带来的挥之不去的影响远远强过哈古卡所面对的一切恐惧。每当他尝试对抗恐惧效果投掷豁免时，他将实际结果的成功度视为比投掷的结果更好一级。

Royal Command.name: 王者号令 Royal Command
Royal Command.description: 哈古卡向他的追随者下令。每个听到并理解此命令的盟友都将获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}，直至该盟友的下一个回合结束，但其仅能使用此额外动作进行打击。哈古卡无法在其下回合使用王者号令。

Shield Rip and Chew.name: 破盾咬嚼 Shield Rip and Chew
Shield Rip and Chew.description:
需求 一名触及内的对手@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]。

效果 哈古卡抓住敌人的盾牌，将其拽到一边。他在对该举起盾牌的对手进行啃咬打击前，先尝试进行一次@Check[type:athletics|defense:reflex]检定对抗其反射DC。如果此运动检定成功，该盾牌在对抗此次啃咬打击时不被视为已经被举起。在大成功时，哈古卡将盾牌拽离其位置，它将不再被举起，直至该名对手再次使用举起盾牌。这在计算多重攻击减值时视为哈古卡进行了两次攻击，但多重攻击减值在完成啃咬打击前不会被累加。

Regeneration 25 (Deactivated by Acid or.name: 再生25（酸蚀或火焰使其无效） Regeneration 25 (Deactivated by Acid or Fire)

Hargulka.hp: 再生25（酸蚀或火焰使其无效）

Hateful Hermit.name: 恶隐士 Hateful Hermit
Hateful Hermit.allSaves: 对抗心灵的豁免+2状态加值

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental.name: 对抗心灵的豁免+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

Focus Hatred.name: 恨意集中 Focus Hatred
Focus Hatred.description:
恶隐士对 30 尺内他能看到的单个敌人倾泻一连串威胁和亵渎的话语。恶隐士在对抗该目标时作出的所有攻击检定获得+1 环境加值，直至他对不同的目标使用恨意集中为止。目标必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:22]豁免，具体效果见后文。恶隐士在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用恨意集中。

大成功 目标不受影响，而且在24小时内临时免疫

成功 目标被仇恨分散了注意力，对抗恶隐士的下次攻击时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]

失败 恶隐士的话语让目标感到不安并使其分神；直至恶隐士的下个回合结束为止，目标陷入措手不及

大失败 同失败，但是目标会陷入措手不及，持续1分钟

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 恶隐士对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成2d6点额外精准伤害。

Trackless Step.name: 无踪步 Trackless Step
Trackless Step.description: 恶隐士在自然环境中总是会获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]的好处，哪怕全速移动也如此。

Hidden Pressure Plate.name: Hidden Pressure Plate
Hidden Pressure Plate.hazarddescription: A hidden pressure plate causes the secret doors to areas C2a to open.

Open Doors.name: Open Doors
Open Doors.description:
Trigger A creature steps onto the pressure plate

Effect The doors to the four C2a rooms open, allowing the goblin bat-dogs to roll Stealth for initiative instead of Perception.

Hidden Pressure Plate.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23] to render the pressure plate nonfunctional, or @Check[type:perception|dc:26] to locate a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} switch near the doors to area C3 that deactivates the pressure plate

Hill Giant Butcher.name: 山丘巨人屠夫 Hill Giant Butcher

equipment-Sack for Holding Rocks.name: 一袋石头 Sack for Holding Rocks

Menace Prey.name: 威胁猎物 Menace Prey
Menace Prey.description: 山丘巨人屠夫指定至多2名他们可以看到和听到的生物，或者是1名他们正在追踪的生物，并将其作为他们的猎物。山丘巨人屠夫在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]猎物的察觉检定，以及对猎物进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]的威吓检定中获得+2环境加值。该效果持续至山丘巨人屠夫再次使用威胁猎物为止。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 屠夫对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成额外2d6精准伤害。

Twin Butchery.name: 双杀 Twin Butchery
Twin Butchery.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 山丘巨人屠夫正在持用2把近战武器，每把武器分别在不同的手中

效果 山丘巨人屠夫同时使用两把斧头对抗单个目标。他作出2次打击对抗他的威胁猎物，这2次打击分别使用需求中的每一把武器。若2次打击都命中了威胁猎物，则将2次伤害合并再判断抗力以及弱点。此外，若2次打击都命中，威胁猎物会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]，持续至山丘巨人屠夫的下隔回合开始为止。山丘巨人屠夫如常计算多重攻击减值。

Wide Swing.name: 猛挥 Wide Swing
Wide Swing.description:
山丘巨人进行一次单独的巨木棒打击，并和触及范围内最多两名敌人的AC相比较。

此攻击在计入山丘巨人的多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击。

Hill Giant Butcher.publicNotes:
这些皮肤粗糙的袭击者自私且粗鲁，但其实是懦夫。山丘巨人性情急躁，喜欢暴力，它们乐于袭击和掠夺手无寸铁的人，但如果遇到比它们更大、更强、更有组织性的敌人，它们就会迅速逃离。山丘巨人总会通过推搡或欺骗自己的同伴来减慢对方的速度以获得更好的战利品。

巨人是生活在世界偏远地区的大型类人生物。它们被分为许多不同类型。

Hillstomper.name: 踏山 Hillstomper
Hillstomper.allSaves: 对抗寒冷的豁免获得+2状态加值

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Cold.name: 对抗寒冷的豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Cold

Cold Adaptation.name: 耐寒 Cold Adaptation
Cold Adaptation.description: 猛犸象受到的寒冷环境效果下降一级。

Dual Tusks.name: 双牙戳刺 Dual Tusks
Dual Tusks.description: 猛犸象进行两次象牙打击，每次攻击不同的目标。此动作在计算多重攻击减值时算一次攻击，并且多重攻击减值在两次攻击之后才增加。

Grabbing Trunk.name: 鼻卷 Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: 猛犸象的象鼻攻击命中中型或更小体型的生物后可以让其陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]状态。如果猛犸象移动，则可以带着受擒的生物一起移动。

Hillstomper.publicNotes:
猛犸象大多生活在寒冷的气候中，它们习惯于与凶残的捕食者打交道，在它们踩踏和碾压敌人的时候用更大的象牙造成更多的破坏。居住在严寒的冻土带的人形生物们会依靠猛犸象的力量来帮助他们生存。

通过大象长长的、灵活的象鼻和令人印象深刻的长牙，人们立刻就能认出它们。在不同的地方的大象有不同的特征。大象在许多地区被当做驮畜，但其实它们非常聪明，必须非常小心地对待。

Hooktongue.name: 钩舌 Hooktongue

Slow Metabolism.name: 代谢缓慢 Slow Metabolism
Slow Metabolism.description: 钩舌可以在不进食的情况下存活 10 年。超出此限制后，钩舌的饥饿就会让他陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，但这并不会影响他的寿命。由于饥饿而陷入缓慢的钩舌可以通过使用活吞进食来移除该状态。

Capsize.name: 倾覆船只 Capsize
Capsize.description: 钩舌尝试倾覆与其相邻、且体型相同或更小的水面船只。他必须尝试运动检定对抗DC35或者驾驶员的航海学识DC，以较高者为准。

Hooktongue Venom.name: 钩舌毒 Hooktongue Venom
Hooktongue Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1 轮)

阶段2 @Damage[3d6[poison]]伤害，笨拙1并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} (1 轮)

阶段3 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}并困惑 (1 轮)

Poison Spray.name: 毒液喷溅 Poison Spray
Poison Spray.description: 钩舌从喉咙中喷出毒液，对@Template[type:line|distance:80]区域造成@Damage[15d6[poison]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true]豁免）。豁免失败或大失败的生物还会沾染到钩舌毒。钩舌在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Poison Spray]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用毒液喷溅。

Water Travel.name: 水中游弋 Water Travel
Water Travel.description: 钩舌能融入水体，仅呈现出一条狭长的暗色蛇形的水域轮廓。在处于该形态时，钩舌的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]速度增加至600尺，在用于游泳的运动检定中自动成功，在水中进行的隐秘检定获得+4环境加值。钩舌能够在该形态中持续8小时，但在使用该能力时无法进入盐水水域。湖怪能使用具有专注特征的单动作来恢复成正常的形态。

Undetectable.name: 难以侦测 Undetectable
Undetectable.description: 钩舌会自动反制任何对他进行的侦测、揭示或探知的预言尝试，使用他的隐秘调整值来进行反制检定。

Hooktongue.publicNotes:
名为湖怪的传说生物潜伏于偏远的湖泊中，他们总是能以某种方式成为湖畔社区的酒馆传说。对一些旅行者来说，每座规模较大的湖泊似乎都会被城镇环绕，且镇上到处都是声称目击过湖怪的渔民。这些难以琢磨的生物主要栖息在湖泊中凉爽幽暗的地区。有些人声称湖怪是海蛇和蛇龙的某种分支，但在人们已经发现的这些生物之间并未找到足够让人信服的联系。

湖怪具有许多海蛇不具备的特征，比如能够理解简单的语言。他们避免与外界产生接触且时刻隐藏自身的本性有时会与同样强烈的好奇心产生冲突，想要窥视湖畔的人们。当湖怪没能忍耐住，想要浮上湖面窥探位于湖岸边或者漂浮在水面上的不同寻常的某人（或某物）时，人们就会目击到湖怪。

这些生物的寿命极长，可以活数十年或者甚至数个世纪，而且食量很小。这使得湖怪可以在不浮上水面的前提下在湖泊中存活多年，即便身处缺乏充足食物来源的淡水水体中也是如此。湖怪可能会在湖床的淤泥中躺上数年，湖怪那难以捉摸的秉性只会让他们那传说中的名声变得更大。当有宠物或儿童在湖泊附近失踪时，就会有传闻说是被本地湖怪抓走了，进而产生民间传说警告居民们不要独自在湖水旁边探险。

大多数湖怪被描绘为蛇形或者颈部很长的爬行动物，但也有一部分看起来像是拉长了的怪异海豹或鲸鱼、大得不可思议的海马、或者颈部很长且生长着类似板龙（Elasmosauruses）的桨状器官。

Hooktongue Hydra.name: 钩舌多头蛇 Hooktongue Hydra

Hydra Regeneration.name: 多头蛇再生 Hydra Regeneration
Hydra Regeneration.description:
多头蛇拥有等同于3×头部数量的再生值。如果多头蛇的身体失去了任何头颅并且余下的断颈还没有被灼烧，多头蛇可以通过再生能力恢复生命值之后进行一次@Check[type:fortitude|immutable:true|dc:35]检定。如果成功，一个未被灼烧的断颈重新长出两个头；如果大成功，两个未被灼烧的断颈分别各自长出两个头。多头蛇长出的头的数量无法超过原本持有的头的两倍。多头蛇的再生能力只有在它所有头都被砍断、所有断颈都被灼烧的情况下才会完全失效，此时它会死亡。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Regeneration]

注意： 原文标注多头蛇再生15，但这这与标准的多头蛇再生规则冲突。

Head Regrowth.name: 头部重生 Head Regrowth
Head Regrowth.description:
多头蛇通常拥有五个头部。一个生物可以把头作为特殊目标并切断它，并造成等同于头部生命值的伤害。任何生物的回合结束时，未被完全切断的头部都将恢复全部生命值。

多头蛇可以使用“多头蛇再生”能力使被切断的头部重生。生物可以通过用酸液或火焰伤害灼烧断颈来阻止其重生。对于单目标的酸液或火焰伤害必须指定灼烧某个特定的断颈，但泼溅伤害或影响整个多头蛇占据空间的酸液或火焰效果能对所有断颈进行灼烧。如果切断头部的攻击带有酸液或火焰效果，则断颈立即被灼烧。如果五个头都被灼烧，则多头蛇会死亡。

多头蛇的头 Hydra Head

  • 生命值 45
  • 免疫 范围伤害
  • 弱点 挥砍5

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.uZJOdounIHaFDC1t]{效果：多头蛇的头}

Multiple Opportunities.name: 多重反应 Multiple Opportunities
Multiple Opportunities.description: 多头蛇除第一个头外，每多一个头，都能获得一个额外的反应动作，但只能用这个反应动作进行借机攻击。多头蛇针对同一个触发动作只能使用一次反应动作，即便一个生物离开它威胁范围数格，并且每次借机攻击都必须使用不同的头部。每当多头蛇被砍掉一个头，它就每轮就失去一个额外的反应动作。

Focused Assault.name: 集中攻击 Focused Assault
Focused Assault.description: 多头蛇用头部集中攻击单一目标，压倒性的多次攻击让敌人几乎无处可躲。多头蛇用尖牙进行打击，一旦成功命中，则多头蛇的尖牙打击对目标进行伤害，并且除第一个头外，每多一个头，都能造成额外[[/r 1d6]]伤害。即使攻击失败，多头蛇依然能对目标造成一次尖牙打击的伤害，但大失败的话则完全失手。此攻击计算多头蛇的多重攻击减值，次数等于多头蛇的头数。

Storm of Jaws.name: 风暴噬咬 Storm of Jaws
Storm of Jaws.description: 多头蛇进行多次打击，打击次数最多等于它的头数，但是每次打击必须针对不同目标。此攻击计算多头蛇的多重攻击减值，但只有当所有打击都结束之后多重攻击减值才会生效。

Hooktongue Hydra.publicNotes: 多头蛇是一种长着许多头颅的、残暴的蛇形怪兽。它们胃口贪婪，再生能力令人畏惧。

Death Throes.name: 致死剧痛 Death Throes
Death Throes.description:
触发 霍拉格纳蒙在沃达凯使用魔宠远视时承受任何伤害或者遭受一种状态；

效果 霍拉格纳蒙死亡，之后在@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]范围内爆发出羽毛以及由烟雾和能量构成的翻涌黑触手。区域内的所有生物必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 生物不受伤害

成功 生物承受@Damage[3d10[void]]伤害

失败 生物承受@Damage[6d10[void]]伤害并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}

大失败 生物承受@Damage[12d10[void]]伤害并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}

Cunning.name: 狡诈 Cunning
Cunning.description: 霍拉格纳蒙能把简单的物品当做工具来使用，比如用一根棍子撬开个开口来取出一块食物。他还很擅长偷东西。他无法使用贼活来尝试手上功夫、解除装置或者开锁，但他能使用贼活来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{盗窃 Steal}能用自己的喙或者脚爪来携带的较轻的物体，或者用贼活来完成其他相对简单的任务。

Twin Riposte.name: Twin Riposte
Twin Riposte.description:
Trigger A creature within Ilora's reach critically fails a melee Strike against her

Requirements Ilora is benefiting from Twin Parry

Effect Ilora attempts a melee Strike or uses a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} action against the triggering opponent.

Nature's Edge.name: Nature's Edge
Nature's Edge.description: Ilora always finds the weak points in her foes' defenses when they're on unfavorable terrain. Enemies are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to her if they're in difficult terrain, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} due to natural or magical environmental effects.

Twin Parry.name: Twin Parry
Twin Parry.description:
Requirements Ilora wields two melee weapons, one in each hand

Effect Ilora gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of her next turn. She loses this bonus if she no longer meets the requirements.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.eu2HidLHaGKe4MPn]{Effect: Twin Parry}

Twin Takedown.name: Twin Takedown
Twin Takedown.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements Ilora wields two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

Effect Ilora makes two Strikes against her target, one with each of the required weapons. If both hit the same target, combine the damage from the weapons for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. She applies her multiple attack penalty to each Strike normally.

Wild Stride.name: Wild Stride
Wild Stride.description: Ilora moves quickly through obstacles. She ignores the effects of nonmagical difficult terrain and treats the hindrances of greater difficult terrain as those of difficult terrain. Within 300 feet of a river bank, she ignores the effects of all nonmagical difficult and greater difficult terrain.

Ilthuliak.name: 伊尔苏利亚克 Ilthuliak
Ilthuliak.allSaves: 对抗所有魔法+1状态加值，对抗心灵+4状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Tail Lash.name: 尾扫 Tail Lash
Tail Lash.description:
触发 一个位于龙的尾击触及范围内的生物将使用一个动作进行打击或者尝试一次技能检定

效果 龙使用它的尾击打击触发的生物，它在此次打击中需承受-2减值。如果命中，则该生物在触发效果的投掷中承受-2环境减值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.QqC9xymSXSVunDgl]{效果：尾扫（攻击骰）}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.4HJJdogS751Z04lD]{效果：尾扫（技能检定）}

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
伊尔苏利亚克喷出一股酸雾，对@Template[type:line|distance:100]区域内的生物造成@Damage[22d6[acid]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true]豁免）。

她在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

Corrupt Water.name: 腐败之水 Corrupt Water
Corrupt Water.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 龙永久性地污染了90尺范围内总计10立方英尺的液体。这些水变得无法饮用，并且也无法让生命在里面进行水下呼吸。

如果液态的魔法物品或炼金物品的等级低于龙的生物等级，那么这些物品也将会被摧毁（一个生物可以尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:41]检定来保护其所携带的液体）。该效果不会影响生物体内的液体。

+4 Status to All Saves vs. Mental.name: 对抗心灵的豁免+4状态加值 +4 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

Ilthuliak.publicNotes:
身为君临于沼地的暴君，黑龙以它们炽热的激情震慑着属于它们的国度。依靠着迅雷般的掠袭和恶毒的诡计，这些以施虐为乐的暴君自幽暗的洞窟或是沼泽的孤岛之中统治着属于它们的腐臭王国。它们对于其他生物的憎恶就像它们吐息的酸液那般强烈，除非是为了交配或是暂时合作来消灭共同的敌人，它们甚至无法容忍其他的龙类出现在它们的王国之中。

黑龙是两栖生物，它们既能够呼吸空气，也能够使用鳃在水下呼吸。它们表皮上褶皱起的鳍状物使它们成为了游泳健将，得以适应湿地环境和被水淹没的巢穴。它们免疫那些由它们自己腐败之水的魔法能力所产生的臭水。

黑龙的巢穴就和它们的灵魂一样污秽。腐烂的肉块散落一地，掠夺而来的宝物躺在粪便之中，纠葛的树根和藤蔓上滴落着阴湿洞穴中独有的粘液。这种地方往往遍布着蛇虫和粘液。虽然它们会尽可能地占据天然的洞窟，不过也能勉为其难地将沼泽中那扭曲的植被最为稠密的区域作为自己的巢穴。由于那些贵重却柔软的物品往往无法从黑龙的强酸中幸存下来，它们的财宝主要都由宝石和昂贵的玻璃制品组成。

从强大无比的位面龙到奇幻诡谲的灵域龙，尽管这世上龙的种类多种多样，却少有一类龙能够像彩色龙那样广为人知却又令人恐惧。爪抓、齿咬、吐息，即使鳞片的颜色各不相同，每种彩色龙都会以其独有的风格散布它们各自的暴虐。与大部分的生物不同，龙只会随着年龄的增长而变得愈发强大。对财宝的贪婪，对食物的饥渴，对鲜血的渴望，对权势的欲望，这些都是属于它们的传说。拥有着无可匹敌的强韧肉身，这些龙类大多道德败坏，并且常常扮演者犯罪黑幕、邪恶暴君或是贪婪掠夺者的角色。

Immense Mandragora.name: 极巨曼德拉草 Immense Mandragora

Blood Scent.name: 血液感知 Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: 曼德拉草能够在30英尺的范围内闻到带血的生物的气味，作为一种模糊感官，而它可以在30英尺的范围内闻到恶魔、精类和术士的血味，作为一种精准感官。

Vulnerability to Supernatural Darkness.name: 超自然黑暗易伤 Vulnerability to Supernatural Darkness
Vulnerability to Supernatural Darkness.description: 每当曼德拉草在魔法黑暗区域开始其回合时，它在该回合承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Apocalyptic Shriek.name: 末日尖叫 Apocalyptic Shriek
Apocalyptic Shriek.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 极巨曼德拉草发出毁灭性的尖叫。30尺内每个非曼德拉草生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:42|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，并且受到@Damage[8d8[mental]]伤害。

失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}，并且受到@Damage[16d8[mental]]伤害。

大失败 该生物恶心2，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，并且受到@Damage[150[mental]]伤害。只要该生物依旧处于恶心状态，这一缓慢状态值就无法减少至1点以下。

Blood Drain.name: 吸血 Blood Drain
Blood Drain.description:
需求 一个生物被极巨曼德拉草@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]

效果 极巨曼德拉草从它抓住的生物身上吸血，造成[[/r 12d6 #Damage]]伤害。如果该生物是恶魔、精类或术士，曼德拉草会获得与所受伤害相等的临时生命值。被曼德拉草拉吸血的生物会承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}，直到它得到任何种类的治疗。

Immense Mandragora Venom.name: 极巨曼德拉草毒液 Immense Mandragora Venom
Immense Mandragora Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]并呆滞1 (1轮)

阶段3 @Damage[6d6[poison]]伤害，困惑并呆滞1 (1轮)

Immense Mandragora.publicNotes:
曼德拉草看起来就像一个刚拔出来的块茎，长成了一个孩子的畸形，有着怪异的脸和狰狞臃肿的身体。这些阴险的小植物通常在曼德拉草被恶魔的血液浇灌后形成。吸收了恶魔之血的超凡属性后，根部就会有生命力，并被迫寻找血液来充饥，以免渴死。

曼德拉草总是饥肠辘辘，为了寻找食物，他们过着痛苦的生活，为了获得他们渴望的血液，他们做出卑鄙和绝望的行为。虽然他们更喜欢被带有魔法的血液，如独角兽、精灵或法师的血液，他们也能够以药水、炼金炸弹和其他魔法药水为食，但曼德拉草能够以非魔法生物的血液为生。他们发现世俗的血液味道平淡而苦涩，而且他们并不吝于向他们所喝的生物表达这些抱怨。

虽然典型的曼德拉草只有人类小孩的大小，但这些邪恶的植物中有些会继续生长，达到与巨人更相似的大小。有时，随着它们的生长，它们会形成额外的肢体或逐渐成形的脸部，最终变成对人形丑恶且粗劣可笑的模仿。

Irahkatu.name: Irahkatu

Voice Imitation.name: Voice Imitation
Voice Imitation.description: Irahkatu can mimic the sounds of a person in distress by attempting a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie}. Irahkatu has a +4 circumstance bonus to this check.

Disfigure.name: Disfigure
Disfigure.description:
Requirements Irahkatu has a Medium or smaller creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} with his tail claw or has already damaged a creature with his claw or tail claw Strike this turn

Effect Irahkatu attempts an @Check[type:athletics|defense:fortitude] check against the creature's Fortitude DC.

Critical Success Irahkatu tears at the target's eyes. The target takes @Damage[14d6[slashing]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 24 hours. This blinded condition is removed earlier if the creature is fully healed of all damage.

Success Irahkatu mangles some fingers. The target takes @Damage[7d6[slashing]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 24 hours.

Failure Irahkatu claws at the creature, dealing @Damage[3d6[slashing]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature is unaffected.

Tail Drag.name: Tail Drag
Tail Drag.description:
Requirements Irahkatu has a Medium or smaller creature grabbed with its tail claw

Effect Irahkatu attempts an @Check[type:athletics|defense:fortitude] check against the creature's Fortitude DC.

Critical Success If the creature is 10 feet away from Irahkatu, it is dragged into a square adjacent to Irahkatu. Irahkatu can make a jaws Strike against the creature.

Success If the creature is 10 feet away from Irahkatu, it is dragged into a square adjacent to Irahkatu.

Failure The creature is not dragged.

Critical Failure The creature is not dragged and Irahkatu no longer has the creature grabbed.

Irahkatu.publicNotes:
The ahuizotl is a vicious, semi-aquatic predator that resembles a hideous cross between a badger and an otter, with disturbingly web-fingered paws supplemented by a fifth hand at the end of a long, serpentine tail. A clever and stealthy hunter, the ahuizotl lures unwary prey to their doom by mimicking the cries of people in distress. The ahuizotl's macabre habit of feeding on a victim's eyes, fingernails, and teeth leaves the corpses of its kills uniquely mutilated. Some say the creatures consider these body parts delicacies, while others insist ahuizotls collect them as tribute to a powerful but unknown entity. The fact that an ahuizotl does not eat the actual flesh of its victims, instead depositing their savaged and waterlogged corpses in locations where the remains are sure to be found by friends or family, points to a third and perhaps more likely possibility-the ahuizotl simply enjoys using its violent dietary quirks to spread fear and despair.

An ahuizotl walks on all fours, but its hands are capable of manipulating simple tools and other objects. Ahuizotls have roughly mustelid features and an extra membrane covering their eyes, giving their eyes a dull color suggestive of cataracts and somewhat blunting the creature's vision. Yet despite their bestial appearance, ahuizotls are nearly as intelligent as the average human, and wiser than most. Although they don't form societies of their own, they have been known to ally with violent cults or conclaves of monsters, and even to found small shrines and temples to sinister deities. The cult of Charon, the horseman of Death, is particularly popular among certain ahuizotls, who look forward to an afterlife spent wallowing in the waters of the River Styx.

Irovetti's Fetch.name: 伊洛维提的回魂精 Irovetti's Fetch
Irovetti's Fetch.hp: 再生45（火焰或虚能使其无效）

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Regeneration 40 (Deactivated by Fire or.name: 再生40（火焰或虚能使其无效） Regeneration 40 (Deactivated by Fire or Void)

Manifest Fetch Weapon.name: 显现回魂精武器 Manifest Fetch Weapon
Manifest Fetch Weapon.description:
触发 回魂精开始其回合

效果 一把回魂精武器显现在该回魂精手中。一旦回魂精武器不再被回魂精携带，它就会消失。回魂精选择它所显现的武器类型，但它不会获得任何该武器标准武器特征，而是改为使用上述回魂精武器打击中所列的特征。

Irovetti's Fetch.publicNotes:
回魂精追踪者源自中型或小型精类或类人生物的灵魂（小型回魂精追踪者与中型的拥有相同的数据）。

回魂精是一个类人生物的扭曲而又怪异的拟像，存在或曾经存在于主物质位面的某一点上。传言中回魂精是来自其他位面存在的持续性的反射，但是这些故事里都没有提及除了智慧来源以外关于这复制品的任何事情。无论是在第一世界或是一个受到第一世界极大影响的区域，当一个强大的生物经历了重大的情感事件或者死亡时，一个回魂精就有可能自发地显现。不过它也有可能是被始祖这种拥有强大力量的存在所创造出来，用以折磨和激怒那些惹恼过他们的人。当一个回魂精从一个灵魂的“反射”中显现时，其与该生物生活中的样貌惊人地相似，只是回魂精并没有属于它自己的真正的记忆。它保留着来自于源体的虚假的记忆片段，就像在一个只记得部分的梦境中经历过它们——这确保了回魂精会嫉妒它的源体，并且因其而感到激怒。

回魂精在外观上与产生了它的那个灵魂的生物非常相似，除了它经常表现出精类特征，例如尖耳朵、植物状的元素、或是超自然的优雅。如果一个回魂精试图模仿依旧活着的源体，则必须隐藏起这些特征，并且注意将其回魂精武器显现为目标所使用的的武器。

当一个回魂精死亡时，它和它所显现的物品将会消失在植物所绽放出的花朵中，它的灵魂立即回到第一世界，留下一片杂草和带刺的花朵，其形状大致就像是它们活着时发出嘲笑的样子。
Irovetti's Fetch.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值

Jaggedbriar Hag.name: Jaggedbriar Hag
Jaggedbriar Hag.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值

Coven.name: Coven
Coven.description:
A Jaggedbriar hag adds @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{Earthbind}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.115Xp9E38CJENhNS]{Magic Passage}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8Umt1AzYfFbC4fui]{Spellwrack} to her coven's spells.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Bonds of Iron.name: Bonds of Iron
Bonds of Iron.description:
Once per day, a jaggerdbrier hag can cause a cage built of cold iron fingernails to spring out of nothingness at a range of up to 30 feet, attempting an @Check[type:athletics|traits:action:grapple|overrideTraits:true] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} against the target's Fortitude DC; if the target has a weakness to cold iron, the jaggerdbrier hag gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.

Unlike a normal Grapple, the jaggerdbrier hag doesn't need to be within reach and can move as she pleases, and a successful attempt lasts until the creature escapes (DC 25), causing the cage to crumble into rust.

Any creature can attempt to destroy the cage by attacking it. It has an AC of 19, Hardness 10, and 40 Hit Points.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Jaggedbriar Hag.publicNotes: Malevolent crones who lurk at the edges of civilization, hags use their deceptive, magical abilities to prey upon humanoids, manipulating and corrupting them. Some say hags arose from fey that became twisted by their inner selfishness. Hags gather together in covens for greater power, craft unique magical items known as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ACa9QlFqdmW4s2Th]{Hag Eyes}, and are known to replace infant humanoids with their own offspring-these children are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.bAjHCeyNcPRqOmLv]{Changelings} who have the potential to become hags themselves.

Jamandi Aldori.name: 嘉曼蒂・奥多里 Jamandi Aldori
Jamandi Aldori.publicNotes:
嘉曼蒂・奥多里在雷斯托夫的成长经历本可以保证她作为一个城市贵族享受安全而又轻松惬意的生活，但她对于来自北方“干涉”的不安和沮丧，让她越来越远离贵族的生活方式。她很快就精通了奥多里剑技的艺术，并且在许多年前就已经成为了雷斯托夫中最著名的剑爵之一。其中一部分是源于她的决斗技巧，但更多的是因为她在近期越来越明显地推动增强雷斯托夫的力量来最小化对布雷斡其余地方的依赖。除了组织进攻失窃之地和意图培养南方的新盟友之外，她希望能有一天在布雷斡以外的地方看到更多的传授奥多里风格的决斗学校——虽然并非所有的同龄人都赞同她的这项追求。

获得嘉曼蒂信任和支持的角色可以根据自己的选择解锁获取@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.cBBwTnJrVmvaRMYq]{奥多里决斗家 Aldori Duelist}变体的许可。

Aldori Parry.name: 奥多里剑格 Aldori Parry
Aldori Parry.description:
需求 嘉曼蒂仅用一只手使用奥多里决斗剑，另一只手为空手；

效果 嘉曼蒂使用她的剑格挡攻击，只要她持续满足要求，她将直到下一个回合开始前在防御等级上获得+2环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.1nCwQErK6hpkNvfw]{效果: 奥多里剑格}

Aldori Riposte.name: 奥多里剑反 Aldori Riposte
Aldori Riposte.description:
需求 嘉曼蒂正受益于奥多里剑格；

触发 在嘉曼蒂触及范围内的敌人对她的攻击大失败；

效果 嘉曼蒂使用奥多里决斗剑进行反击，对触发的敌人进行一次近战打击或者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}动作。

Saving Slash.name: 求生斩击 Saving Slash
Saving Slash.description:
触发 一名敌人使用近战攻击对嘉曼蒂造成重击；

效果 嘉曼蒂迅速旋转剑刃，试图以此卸去足够的动能以避免这次攻击造成最糟糕的情况。如果她成功通过一次@Check[type:flat|dc:16]检定，这次攻击将变成普通攻击而非重击。

Unnerving Prowess.name: 威慑技巧 Unnerving Prowess
Unnerving Prowess.description:
触发 嘉曼蒂使用她的剑在一次打击或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}上大成功；

效果 嘉曼蒂尝试对她卸武或打击的目标进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}；这种方式进行的挫败士气没有听觉特征，即便目标不懂她的语言，她也不会在检定上受到罚值。

Distracting Yipping.name: Distracting Yipping
Distracting Yipping.description:
Jewel unleashes a torrent of grating, high-pitched yips. All creatures other than Pavetta within @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to Distracting Yipping for 24 hours.

Success The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Perception checks for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Perception checks and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round.

Critical Failure As failure, but also, if the creature attempts any concentrate action during the round, they must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] or the action is lost.

Return to Pavetta.name: Return to Pavetta
Return to Pavetta.description: If Pavetta doesn't sustain her Release Jewel action, Jewel can only take Stride actions to return to Pavetta's square. If she's in her square, she takes no actions.

Ankle Bite.name: Ankle Bite
Ankle Bite.description: If Jewel damages a Small or larger creature standing on the ground with her jaws Strike, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round (or off-guard and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round on a critical hit).

Site Bound.name: 束缚之地 Site Bound
Site Bound.description: 典型的灵魂通常只能距离在他被杀死或作祟的地点很近的区域逗留。这个限制一般为120尺远。部分幽灵会被限制在对他来说具有特殊意义的房间、建筑、物品或生物上，而非具体的某个地点。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
如果达利梵（区域 C7）和拉玛什图之花（区域C10）都被击败，金就会安息。

当幽灵被摧毁时，他会在[[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4天}后在被束缚的地点重新生成，生命值全满。只有在有人确定了幽灵存在的成因并纠正任何阻止幽灵安息的因素时，幽灵才能被永久摧毁。

Frightful Moan.name: 骇人悲叹 Frightful Moan
Frightful Moan.description: 幽灵为自身的命运而哀悼，迫使@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]内的每个活物尝试1次@Check[type:will|dc:28]豁免。豁免失败时，该生物会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}（大失败则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}）。豁免成功时，该生物会在1分钟内临时免疫幽灵的骇人悲叹。

Telekinetic Assault.name: 念动突击 Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description: 幽灵痛苦地尖啸并使得小物体和物体碎片在@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]内迸发飞溅。此区域内的生物会受到@Damage[5d6[bludgeoning]]伤害，@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免。

Scholar (Nature).name: 学者 Scholar (自然)
Scholar (Nature).description:
你有学习的天分，你两耳不闻窗外事，只求能学到尽可能多的知识。你在书中读到了许多奇妙的地方和事物，并且总是梦想有一天能亲眼目睹它们。最终，这种好奇心引领着你放下学业，成为了一名冒险者。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在奥法、自然、神秘或宗教技能上受训，并获得针对你所选技能的技能专长：@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{驾轻就熟 Assurance}。你还会在学术（Academia）学识技能上受训。

Scholar (Nature).name: 学者 Scholar (自然)
Scholar (Nature).description:
你有学习的天分，你两耳不闻窗外事，只求能学到尽可能多的知识。你在书中读到了许多奇妙的地方和事物，并且总是梦想有一天能亲眼目睹它们。最终，这种好奇心引领着你放下学业，成为了一名冒险者。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在奥法、自然、神秘或宗教技能上受训，并获得针对你所选技能的技能专长：@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{驾轻就熟 Assurance}。你还会在学术（Academia）学识技能上受训。

Wounded Arm.name: 手臂受创 Wounded Arm
Wounded Arm.description: 尤格林多的手臂由于安米芮的巨剑而遭受了重创。这个伤口的不适感导致尤格林多的护甲等级和打击受到-2环境减值（这些调整值已经包含在他的数据中）。在他的每个回合结束时，尤格林多必须尝试@Check[type:flat|dc:12]检定，否则伤口会再次裂开并流血，对他造成@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害。直至生命值回复至全满为止，他无法如同标准的巨人一般再次使用投石或接石能力。

Chill Breath.name: 冻寒吹息 Chill Breath
Chill Breath.description: 尤格林多喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:15]的水汽，这些水汽会迅速凝结成寒冰，造成@Damage[2d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true]豁免）。在该豁免中投掷出大失败的生物还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]，直至该生物逃脱（DC 18）为止。尤格林多在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Chill Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用冻寒吹息。

Kargstaad.name: Kargstaad

Wide Swing.name: 猛挥 Wide Swing
Wide Swing.description: The frost giant makes a single greataxe Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the frost giant's multiple attack penalty.

Juggernaut.name: 钢铁之躯 Juggernaut
Juggernaut.description: 当卡尔戈斯塔德在一个强韧豁免检定上取得成功时，将其替换为大成功。

Chill Breath.name: Chill Breath
Chill Breath.description:
The frost giant breathes out a @Template[type:cone|distance:15|damaging:yes]{15-foot cone} of freezing moisture that quickly condenses into ice, dealing @Damage[9d6[cold]] damage. Each creature in the cone must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save.

A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and takes @Damage[2d6[cold]] damage at the end of each of its turns until it gets free (Escape DC 41).

The giant can't use Chill Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Chill Breath]]{1d4 rounds}.

Hatchet Onslaught.name: Hatchet Onslaught
Hatchet Onslaught.description:
Requirements Each of Kargstaad's four hands wields a hatchet.

Effect Kargstaad Strides up to half his speed, then makes four hatchet Strikes, applying his multiple attack penalty as normal.

Ice Stride.name: Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: A frost giant isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor does it need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description:
Requirements Kargstaad isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging.

Effect Kargstaad gains 25 temporary hit points, deals an extra 12 points of damage with thrown rocks, and deals an extra 6 points of damage with hatchets. He takes a -1 penalty to AC and can't use actions with the concentrate trait (except @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}) unless they also have the rage trait.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}

Kargstaad.publicNotes:
霜巨人是冷酷无情的掠夺者，它们在荒凉、寒冷的土地上对那些胆敢靠近它们居住地的人进行劫掠。它们的氏族包括宣称一整片苔原的领土猎人，以及漫游在冰川之间寻找可征服定居点的冻土游民。霜巨人的氏族领袖是那些在战斗中最凶残的人——那些自称为首领并要求追随者绝对服从的魁梧蛮人。如果有任何霜巨人想成为首领，他们就必须向现有首领发起挑战，进行一场死斗，之后胜利者能继续领导氏族。

霜巨人生活在严寒国度，它们的外表能反映出它们经历过无情的暴风雪和严寒的考验。它们经常穿着金属盔甲，盔甲上装饰着毛皮、牙齿和野兽的獠牙，挥舞着餐桌一样长的重型武器。它们的肤色从淡蓝色到岩灰色，发色则是暗白色或肮脏的黄色。

典型的霜巨人高约15尺，重约2800磅。

巨人是生活在世界偏远地区的大型类人生物。它们被分为许多不同类型。

Kargstaad's Giant.name: 卡尔戈斯塔德的巨人 Kargstaad's Giant

Ice Stride.name: 冰上行走 Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: 霜巨人不会被冰雪造成的困难地形阻碍，也不需要尝试特技检定来避免在光滑的冰面上滑倒。

Wide Swing.name: 猛挥 Wide Swing
Wide Swing.description: 霜巨人进行一次单独的巨斧打击，并和触及范围内最多两名敌人的AC相比较。此攻击在计入霜巨人的多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击。

Chill Breath.name: 冻寒吐息 Chill Breath
Chill Breath.description:
霜巨人呼出@Template[type:cone|distance:15|damaging:yes]的寒冷水汽，瞬间凝结成冰，造成@Damage[7d6[cold]]伤害。锥形范围内的每个生物都必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|basic:true]豁免。

豁免失败的生物同时还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]，并且它每回合结束时会受到@Damage[2d6[cold]]伤害，直到它重获自由（脱逃DC36）。

霜巨人在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Chill Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用冻寒吐息。

Kargstaad's Giant.publicNotes:
霜巨人是冷酷无情的掠夺者，它们在荒凉、寒冷的土地上对那些胆敢靠近它们居住地的人进行劫掠。它们的氏族包括宣称一整片苔原的领土猎人，以及漫游在冰川之间寻找可征服定居点的冻土游民。霜巨人的氏族领袖是那些在战斗中最凶残的人——那些自称为首领并要求追随者绝对服从的魁梧蛮人。如果有任何霜巨人想成为首领，他们就必须向现有首领发起挑战，进行一场死斗，之后胜利者能继续领导氏族。

霜巨人生活在严寒国度，它们的外表能反映出它们经历过无情的暴风雪和严寒的考验。它们经常穿着金属盔甲，盔甲上装饰着毛皮、牙齿和野兽的獠牙，挥舞着餐桌一样长的重型武器。它们的肤色从淡蓝色到岩灰色，发色则是暗白色或肮脏的黄色。

典型的霜巨人高约15尺，重约2800磅。

巨人是生活在世界偏远地区的大型类人生物。它们被分为许多不同类型。

Kellid Graveknight.name: 凯利德死墓骑士 Kellid Graveknight
Kellid Graveknight.publicNotes: 死墓骑士是由被诅咒的铠甲赋予不死身的亡灵战士。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
当死墓骑士被摧毁时，其护甲会在[[/br 1d10 #days]]{1d10天}内重塑身体——若护甲被活着的宿主穿戴则会更加迅速。若身体在此之前被破坏，重塑过程将重新开始。

只有摧毁护甲（比如使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]）、把死墓骑士传送至正能量位面、或者丢进火山之中才能够永久摧毁死墓骑士。

Sacrilegious Aura.name: 亵渎灵光 Sacrilegious Aura
Sacrilegious Aura.description: 30尺。当有生物在灵光范围内使用命能法术或能力时，死墓骑士会自动用[[/r 1d20+23 #Counteract]]{+23}的反制调整值尝试反制它。

Devastating Blast.name: 毁灭爆震 Devastating Blast
Devastating Blast.description: 死墓骑士释放出@Template[type:cone|distance:30]能量。区域内的生物受到@Damage[8d12[cold]]伤害，（@Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true]豁免）。死墓骑士每[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Devastating Blast]]{1d4轮}只能使用1次该能力。

Graveknight's Curse.name: 死墓骑士诅咒 Graveknight's Curse
Graveknight's Curse.description:
诅咒会影响任何穿戴死墓骑士的护甲超过1小时以上的生物。

豁免检定 @Check[type:will|dc:34]

潜伏期 1小时

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}且无法脱下护甲（1日）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 2}，该生物的速度减10尺，且无法脱下护甲（1日）

阶段3 死亡并转化为护甲的死墓骑士

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.6rnB7nK6J6zF4vea]{效果：死墓骑士诅咒}

Repulsing Blow.name: 击退打击 Repulsing Blow
Repulsing Blow.description:
需求 死墓骑士的上一个动作是使用猛推武器进行打击，且打击成功。

效果 被猛推武器击中的目标会被击退10尺，并且必须进行@Check[type:will|dc:33]豁免，否则1轮内无法进入死墓骑士周围5尺范围。如果上个动作是大成功，则目标意志豁免自动失败。

Weapon Master.name: 武器大师 Weapon Master
Weapon Master.description: 死墓骑士无论持用何种武器，均可以使用该武器的重击专精效果。

Hurried Retreat.name: 匆忙逃窜 Hurried Retreat
Hurried Retreat.description:
需求 狗头人至少与1名敌人相邻

效果 狗头人行走，距离至多为其速度外加5尺，并且在对抗由此移动触发的反应动作时，AC获得+2环境加值。他必须在与任何敌人都不相邻的空间内结束此次移动。

King Vesket.name: 国王威斯科特 King Vesket

Righteous Certainty.name: 理直气壮 Righteous Certainty
Righteous Certainty.description: 每当威斯科特陷入惊惧时，他都会使该状态值降低1点。若威斯科特意识到魂灵斯提沙克实际上是个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.wRQ7TZdd0n5UIIao]的话，他便会失去该能力。

Trident Twist.name: 扭转三叉戟 Trident Twist
Trident Twist.description:
需求 威斯科特正在持用1把三叉戟

效果 威斯科特对1名敌人尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]。若他得到大成功，他会对被缴械的敌人作出1次三叉戟近战打击，使用与缴械尝试相同的多重攻击减值。这次三叉戟打击不会被计入到他的多重攻击减值中。

Triumphant Roar.name: 胜利咆哮 Triumphant Roar
Triumphant Roar.description:
需求 威斯科特的上个动作将1个敌人的生命值降低至0点

效果 威斯科特尝试一次威吓检定，对30尺内的至多4名敌人尝试UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]。对于每次挫败成功，他都会获得4点临时生命值（大成功为8点），这些临时生命值持续10分钟。

Kob Moleg.name: 科布·莫莱格 Kob Moleg

Kob's Ruinous Strike.name: 科布的毁灭一击 Kob's Ruinous Strike
Kob's Ruinous Strike.description: 科布·莫莱格作出 1 次近战打击。若他命中并造成伤害，目标会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，重击时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

Wide Swing.name: 猛挥 Wide Swing
Wide Swing.description:
山丘巨人进行一次单独的巨木棒打击，并和触及范围内最多两名敌人的AC相比较。

此攻击在计入山丘巨人的多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击。

Kob Moleg.publicNotes:
这些皮肤粗糙的袭击者自私且粗鲁，但其实是懦夫。山丘巨人性情急躁，喜欢暴力，它们乐于袭击和掠夺手无寸铁的人，但如果遇到比它们更大、更强、更有组织性的敌人，它们就会迅速逃离。山丘巨人总会通过推搡或欺骗自己的同伴来减慢对方的速度以获得更好的战利品。

巨人是生活在世界偏远地区的大型类人生物。它们被分为许多不同类型。

Korog.name: Korog

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
当死墓骑士被摧毁时，其护甲会在[[/br 1d10 #days]]{1d10天}内重塑身体——若护甲被活着的宿主穿戴则会更加迅速。若身体在此之前被破坏，重塑过程将重新开始。

只有摧毁护甲（比如使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]）、把死墓骑士传送至正能量位面、或者丢进火山之中才能够永久摧毁死墓骑士。

Sacrilegious Aura.name: Sacrilegious Aura
Sacrilegious Aura.description: 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a vitality spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+26 #Counteract]]{+26}.

Designate Blood Foe.name: Designate Blood Foe
Designate Blood Foe.description: Korog declares one creature he can see within 30 feet to be his blood-foe whom he swears to defeat. He can have up to three blood-foes designated at a time; any additional blood-foe removes another blood-foe of Korog's choice. Korog treats the results of Perception checks made against blood-foes as improved by one degree, and he has a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against his blood-foes' attacks.

Devastating Blast.name: Devastating Blast
Devastating Blast.description: The graveknight unleashes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy. Creatures in the area take @Damage[9d12[electricity]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save). The graveknight can use this ability once every [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Devastating Blast]]{1d4 rounds}.

Graveknight's Curse.name: Graveknight's Curse
Graveknight's Curse.description:
This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:37] save

Onset 1 hour

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, the creature's Speed is reduced by 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.6rnB7nK6J6zF4vea]{Effect: Graveknight's Curse}

Korog's Command.name: Korog's Command
Korog's Command.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Korog commands his allies to take an action. All allies who hear or see him are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 round and can use this extra action to Step, Stride, or make a Strike against one of Korog's blood-foes.

Weapon Master.name: Weapon Master
Weapon Master.description: The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.

Korog.publicNotes: Graveknights are undead warriors granted unlife by a cursed suit of armor.

Hatchet Flurry.name: Hatchet Flurry
Hatchet Flurry.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirement She wields hatchets in each hand

Effect She attacks with both hatchets, making two Strikes at the same target. Apply her multiple attack penalty to each Strike normally.

Maming Chop.name: Maming Chop
Maming Chop.description: Kressle has a violent knack for striking grievous wounds to her opponent's hands. If she scores a critical hit on a target with a hatchet Strike, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure). This condition persists until the target receives any amount of healing.

Wolf Empathy.name: 狼类认同 Wolf Empathy
Wolf Empathy.description: 昆达尔能够与狼类进行沟通。

Ambush Strike.name: 伏击 Ambush Strike
Ambush Strike.description:
需求 昆达尔使用隐秘作为先攻，并且这是战斗中的第一轮；

效果 昆达尔最多以满速行走，然后对一个邻接的目标进行一次啃咬打击和一次爪抓打击。他在每次打击中如常应用多次攻击减值。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
具有拳头+16造成 1d4+7钝击伤害的人类，或速度40尺且啃咬具有击倒的狼。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Curse of the Werewolf.name: 狼化人诅咒 Curse of the Werewolf
Curse of the Werewolf.description:
此诅咒仅能影响类人生物。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

在每个月圆之夜，被诅咒的生物必须尝试另一次强韧豁免，失败则会变化为狼化人，直至黎明。

该生物会在GM的控制之下，并在后半夜横冲直撞直至天明并失去知觉。

Moon Frenzy.name: 满月狂乱 Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description: 昆达尔的满月狂乱能力与典型怪物有所不同：他不会变为大型体型，但他会变得更为迅捷和强大。当处于满月狂乱时，他的速度增加到35尺，并且他的啃咬伤害增加2点（这些调整值已经计入上述统计数据中）。此外，当处于满月狂乱时，昆达尔在回合开始时获得一个额外的反应动作，该动作仅能用于反应打击。

Rip and Drag.name: 连撕带拽 Rip and Drag
Rip and Drag.description:
需求 昆达尔这一回合的上一个动作是使用他的啃咬打击伤害了一个目标

效果 昆达尔咀嚼被咬住的生物，并且尝试通过@Check[type:athletics|defense:fortitude]检定对抗被咬住的生物的强韧DC来压制他们。

大成功 昆达尔对目标造成@Damage[5d6[piercing]]伤害，使他们暴露在狼化人诅咒中，并且能够以他一半的速度行走。如果他的目标是中型或者更小，他将目标拖拽到一个新的邻接他的格子中。

成功 昆达尔对目标造成@Damage[5d6[piercing]]伤害，使他们暴露在狼化人诅咒中。他能将目标的位置改换到其原本位置5尺内的并且邻接他的格子中。

失败 如同成功，除了仅造成@Damage[2d6[piercing]]伤害。

大失败 昆达尔无法造成任何伤害。

Leng Envoy.name: 冷原特使 Leng Envoy

Planar Fast Healing.name: 异界快速治疗 Planar Fast Healing
Planar Fast Healing.description:
冷原居民总是和冷原维持连接，当它离开冷原时，它获得快速治疗5。它在冷原或跨位面连接失效的区域中会失去这种能力。如果被杀死，他们的身体会在[[/br 1d4 #Dissolve Body]]{1d4轮}中消失，装备掉落在原地。被杀的冷原居民会在冷原重生，只有他们的异界快速治疗失效时，他们才能被真正地杀死。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FastHealing]

Debilitating Bite.name: 衰弱噬咬 Debilitating Bite
Debilitating Bite.description: 受到冷原居民啃咬伤害的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。生物在之后每次豁免失败时，笨拙状态值都会增加1（最大达到笨拙4）。该状态值每经过24小时减少1点。

Leng Ruby.name: 冷原红宝石 Leng Ruby
Leng Ruby.description: 许多冷原居民携带者从冷原开采的奇异红宝石。只要生物心甘情愿地接受红宝石作为来自冷原居民的礼物或报酬，在该生物持有宝石期间，任何1英里内的冷原居民都可以将该生物作为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]的施法目标，并且宝石的持有者在对抗流放诅咒时的豁免鉴定结果下降一个成功度。

Play the Pipes.name: 奏管乐 Play the Pipes
Play the Pipes.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 冷原特使持有一件乐器

效果 使者可以用其乐器演奏旋律，施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Jvyy6oVIQsD34MHB]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FmNDwqMEjeTEGPrY]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]，而不需要消耗法术位，并使用音乐来代替提供法术成分的动作。该法术获得听觉特性，并以@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]范围内的所有生物为目标，而不是其通常目标。如果生物对抗任何法术时意志豁免成功，就会在1分钟内暂时对特使管乐所释放的所有法术免疫。异怪免疫这种音乐。

Leng Envoy.publicNotes:
冷原居民是居住在寒冷、狂风怒号的冷原里的奴隶贩子和掠夺者。这些恶毒的类人生物驾驶着不详的黑船，航行穿越维度和位面的边界。尽管大多数冷原居民像强盗一样四处抓捕奴隶、掠夺财富，但也有一些人自封为特使或商人，用各种用某诡计来挑动不和。神秘的冷原居民穿着飘逸的长袍、面纱和头巾让他看起来很像人类，但只要多看几眼就能发现它们明显具有异怪般的生理特征——头顶有粗短的角，嘴部长着触手，以及像山羊一样毛茸茸的腿。

在那些指挥着声名狼藉的黑船的凶猛船长之上，还有更高位阶的冷原居民。这些教徒和音乐家充当大祭司的角色，努力安抚着那些以冷酷的恶意俯视噩梦国度的骇人古神们。

Lesser Jabberwock.name: Lesser Jabberwock
Lesser Jabberwock.publicNotes:
Few beasts have inspired as many legends, poems, songs, and myths in as many cultures, as this bizarre draconic creature. The jabberwock hails from the fey realm of the First World and is part of a group of powerful First World creatures known collectively as the Tane.

Like all members of the Tane, jabberwocks are living creatures that age, eat, drink, and sleep, but do not reproduce normally. Instead, they are created directly by the godlike Eldest who rule the First World, and they serve at the pleasure of these capricious and mysterious entities. Believed to be the most powerful of all the Tane, jabberwocks are typically only ever created with one purpose: to wreak destruction and havoc upon the Material Plane. One of the Eldest might send a jabberwock to devastate a country, continent, or even entire world in order to get revenge for some slight made against them by a single mortal. Sometimes, no specific insult or injury is required, as some of the Eldest resent the very existence of the Material Plane and periodically create jabberwocks simply to express the wrath of the First World against its younger and less chaotic sibling.

Once a jabberwock arrives on the Material Plane, its first order of business is to seek out a lair. It prefers dwelling in remote forest locations about a day's flight from civilization-the more dangerous the woodland is to those who might eventually come hunting it, the better!

The relationship between jabberwocks and vorpal weapons is the subject of much debate and speculation among scholars, and the various poems, songs, and legends about the jabberwock do little to clarify the issue, conflicting and diverging on this point. Some believe that vorpal weapons were first created specifically to combat jabberwocks, but others take the story one step further. They cite evidence in certain ancient myths that there may once have been only a single, unique jabberwock, so powerful that nothing could so much as scratch it-nothing, that is, except for the first vorpal sword, crafted for that very purpose. So epic was the resulting battle that it created strange echoes throughout reality, and as a result, these echoes, in the form of vorpal weapons, can now be found on many worlds. Those who subscribe to this belief claim that the jabberwocks seen today are but pale imitations of this proto-jabberwock, and they speculate that only the combined efforts of several Eldest would be sufficient to create such a creature again.

Variant JabberwocksThe Eldest have sometimes altered certain aspects of the jabberwocks they create. Some of the more notorious or legendary variant jabberwocks include the following.

Frumious Jabberwock: Frumious jabberwocks have two heads. They are level 24 and gain an extra action on each of their turns they can use only to make a jaws Strike.

Mimsy Jabberwock: Typically hailing from wintry regions of the First World, mimsy jabberwocks have glowing blue-white scales, resist cold instead of fire, and have eyes that burn with blue flames that deal cold damage instead of fire damage.

Slithy Jabberwock: Wreaking destruction beneath the waves, these sinuous and slimy jabberwocks are amphibious, have a swim Speed of 80 feet instead of the normal fly Speed, and do not have a wing Strike. A slithy jabberwock's whiffling aura is activated whenever it swims, makes a tail Strike, or Burbles.

Planar Acclimation.name: Planar Acclimation
Planar Acclimation.description: The jabberwock always treats the plane it is currently located on as its home plane.

Claws That Catch.name: Claws That Catch
Claws That Catch.description:
Trigger A creature within the jabberwock's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, leaves a square during a move action, makes a ranged attack, or uses a concentrate action

Effect The jabberwock makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature. If the Strike hits, the jabberwock disrupts the triggering action.

Vorpal Fear.name: Vorpal Fear
Vorpal Fear.description: A jabberwock damaged by a vorpal weapon becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4} on a critical hit).

Burble.name: Burble
Burble.description:
The jabberwock creates a blast of strange noises and shouted nonsense in the various languages it knows (and invariably some languages it doesn't know), creating one of two effects.

The jabberwock can't Burble again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Burble]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Confusion @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]. Each creature in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:44] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #Confused Duration]]{1d4 rounds}.
  • Sonic Beam The jabberwock focuses its Burbling into a @Template[type:line|distance:60] of sonic energy that deals @Damage[22d6[sonic]] damage to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true] save).

Jaws That Bite.name: Jaws That Bite
Jaws That Bite.description: If the jabberwock makes a jaws attack and rolls a natural 19 on the d20 roll, the attack is a critical hit. This has no effect if the 19 would be a failure.

Whiffling.name: Whiffling
Whiffling.description:
Trigger The jabberwock Flies or makes a wing Strike

Effect The jabberwock's wings whiffle, creating severe winds within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. These winds move outward from the jabberwock, and they persist until the start of the jabberwock's next turn. During this time, flight of any kind in the emanation requires a successful Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight}, and creatures flying toward the jabberwock are moving through greater difficult terrain. Creatures on the ground in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:41|name:Approach Jabberwock] check to approach the jabberwock.

Goblin Scuttle.name: Goblin Scuttle
Goblin Scuttle.description:
Trigger A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the goblin.

Effect The goblin @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Steps}.

Reach Spell.name: Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description: If the next action Lickweed takes is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet.

equipment-Clothing and Crown made of tho.name: Clothing and Crown made of thorny vines and weeds

Lights of the Lost.name: Lights of the Lost
Lights of the Lost.disable: @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:42] check to promise the restless spirits that justice will be served and the cause of their pain will be punished, or @Check[type:religion|dc:36] to invoke Cayden Cailean to calm the haunt.
Lights of the Lost.hazarddescription: The murdered spirits of the slain priests manifest as churning, glowing spheres of floating, blood- red wine that drift and slither through the air. Within each can be glimpsed a silently screaming face.

Waves of Fear.name: Waves of Fear
Waves of Fear.description:
Trigger A creature opens any of the doors into a priest's cell

Effect Waves of fear wash through area A12 as all creatures in the room realize that, one by one, their loved ones are being murdered and that they will be the last to be slain. Every creature in area A12 must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:37] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Lights of the Lost.routine:
(3 actions) Up to four different creatures in area A12 are each targeted by one of the floating, churning spheres of wine drifting through the air; it hurtles toward them and douses them with wine that turns to life- draining blood as it strikes unerringly. The haunt cannot target the same creature more than once each round. After the haunt is reduced to its broken threshold of 53 HP, it can target no more than two different creatures. A creature targeted by the lights of the lost must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[4d6[void]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} from drunkenness.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[8d6[void]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Critical Failure The takes @Damage[16d6[void]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3}, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}. As long as the creature is doomed from this trap, they cannot reduce their sickened condition below 1, and they take a -1 circumstance penalty on all further saving throws made against fear effects as lingering traces of the terror the priests felt loom in their memories.

Lintwerth.name: Lintwerth

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: Lintwerth breathes a cloud of dust in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals @Damage[6d6[slashing]] damage to each creature within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]). The air in this area remains thick with dust for the next 4 rounds; while Lintwerth is in this area his fast healing functions normally, but other breathing creatures who end their turn in the area must make a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure) from coughing on the dusty air. Lintwerth can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Lintwerth.publicNotes:
Whining and self-important creatures, dust mephits are known for their tendency to pronounce doom and gloom at every opportunity, lamenting every insignificant and minor difficulty as though it were an insurmountable obstacle and making themselves out to be heroes for struggling valiantly against their cruel fates. They tend to be thin and gaunt, with dusky brown and gray skin and wings.

Mephits are small, weak creatures that serve at the whims of other elemental entities. The mephits presented here are less common than air mephits, earth mephits, and the like, as they are a blend of two different elements rather than focusing on one alone.

Lizardfolk Warrior.name: Lizardfolk Warrior

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: A lizardfolk warrior can hold their breath for 180 rounds (18 minutes).

Sudden Charge.name: Sudden Charge
Sudden Charge.description: With a quick sprint, the lizardfolk warrior dashes up to their foe and swings. They Stride or Swim twice. If they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

Terrain Advantage.name: Terrain Advantage
Terrain Advantage.description: Non-lizardfolk creatures in difficult terrain and non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a swim Speed are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the lizardfolk scout.

Lizardfolk Warrior.publicNotes:
When human scholars speak of ancient civilizations, they usually turn their focus to themselves, researching and lecturing on the first human empires. When they drift to others, they invariably look to cultures that had conflicts or alliances with ancient humanity. That the culture of the people called lizardfolk often gets ignored or forgotten even by well-meaning researchers is thus no surprise, but to the lizardfolk themselves it is no matter. They know their history and value its integrity and privacy-if younger ancestries like humanity aren't interested in learning from lizardfolk empires dating back to before the first human knocked two rocks together to make their first campfire, that's fine with them.

The word 'lizardfolk' is an excellent example of humanity's narrow-sighted view of this culture. The name of their people is 'iruxi', but these reptilian humanoids have patiently and good-naturedly accepted the name 'lizardfolk' as a variant, and they generally resist urges to call humans and other mammalians similarly derivative names in return. Iruxis dwell and thrive in all tropical and temperate biomes, but they are most at home in swamplands, coastal regions, and riverlands, for they are talented swimmers, and fish and aquatic plants make up a large part of their preferred diets.

Locking Alarm.name: 上锁警报器 Locking Alarm

Lock and Shriek.name: 上锁与尖叫 Lock and Shriek
Lock and Shriek.description:
触发 一个生物试图打开或影响这扇门

效果 依多卓思的圣徽在门上发出绿色的光芒，将门封住，同时发出像受折磨的灵魂在尖叫的声音。D1-D4区都能听到哭号声，且声音足够唤醒D2区的波达尸。

门处于上锁状态时，可以尝试@Check[type:athletics|dc:32]检定进行破拆，或者@Check[type:thievery|dc:32]检定进行撬锁。锁也可以用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（5环级，反制DC29）反制。

一旦被触发，警报器就会一直尖叫且门会一直锁着，直到危害被解除或者门被摧毁或打开。用指尖在门的两侧描画依多卓思的沙漏状圣徽，可以解除警报和封门的结界。

Locking Alarm.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:32]（专家）绕过门上的魔法触发器，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（5环级，反制DC29）以反制警报。
Locking Alarm.hazarddescription: 任何人试图打开门，却没有先用指尖描画门上的依多卓思圣徽（沙漏），会导致发光的绿色防护罩出现将门封住并触发警报。

Tandem Chop.name: Tandem Chop
Tandem Chop.description:
Trigger A creature or object within their reach is hit with a Strike by an ally using a weapon in the axe group

Requirements The logger is holding a weapon in the axe group

Effect The logger attempts a Strike against the same creature or object. If it hits, combine the damage with the damage from the triggering Strike for the purpose of Hardness, resistances, and weaknesses. A creature or object can only be the target of a single Tandem Chop per turn, regardless of the number of loggers in reach.

Malgorzata Niska.name: 玛尔戈扎塔·尼丝卡 Malgorzata Niska

Spiteful Command.name: 恶毒命令 Spiteful Command
Spiteful Command.description:
触发 玛尔戈扎塔被作为一次攻击或是单目标法术的目标。

效果 玛尔戈扎塔命令一名触及范围包括触发生物的吉罗娜邪教徒攻击该生物，允许其在触发动作结算完效果后进行一次近战打击。

Mandragora Swarm.name: 曼德拉草集群 Mandragora Swarm
Mandragora Swarm.publicNotes:
曼德拉草看起来就像一个刚拔出来的块茎，长成了一个孩子的畸形，有着怪异的脸和狰狞臃肿的身体。这些阴险的小植物通常在曼德拉草被恶魔的血液浇灌后形成。吸收了恶魔之血的超凡属性后，根部就会有生命力，并被迫寻找血液来充饥，以免渴死。

曼德拉草总是饥肠辘辘，为了寻找食物，他们过着痛苦的生活，为了获得他们渴望的血液，他们做出卑鄙和绝望的行为。虽然他们更喜欢被带有魔法的血液，如独角兽、精灵或法师的血液，他们也能够以药水、炼金炸弹和其他魔法药水为食，但曼德拉草能够以非魔法生物的血液为生。他们发现世俗的血液味道平淡而苦涩，而且他们并不吝于向他们所喝的生物表达这些抱怨。

虽然典型的曼德拉草只有人类小孩的大小，但这些邪恶的植物中有些会继续生长，达到与巨人更相似的大小。有时，随着它们的生长，它们会形成额外的肢体或逐渐成形的脸部，最终变成对人形丑恶且粗劣可笑的模仿。

Blood Scent.name: 血液感知 Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: 曼德拉草能够在30英尺的范围内闻到带血的生物的气味，作为一种模糊感官，而它可以在30英尺的范围内闻到恶魔、精类和术士的血味，作为一种精准感官。

Vulnerability to Supernatural Darkness.name: 超自然黑暗易伤 Vulnerability to Supernatural Darkness
Vulnerability to Supernatural Darkness.description: 每当曼德拉草在魔法黑暗区域开始其回合时，它在该回合承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Blood Drain.name: 吸血 Blood Drain
Blood Drain.description:
触发 一个敌人因曼德拉草集群的集群啃咬动作而受到伤害

效果 曼德拉草集群吸吮该生物的鲜血，造成[[/r 9d6 #Damage]]伤害。如果该生物是恶魔、精类或者术士，曼德拉草获得等同于所造成伤害的临时生命值。被曼德拉草拉吸血的生物会承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}，直到它得到任何种类或数量的治疗。

Mandragora Swarm Venom.name: 曼德拉草集群毒液 Mandragora Swarm Venom
Mandragora Swarm Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1 轮)

阶段2 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}并呆滞1 (1 轮)

阶段3 @Damage[6d6[poison]]伤害，困惑并呆滞1 (1 轮)

Piercing Shriek.name: 刺耳尖叫 Piercing Shriek
Piercing Shriek.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 曼德拉草发出令人不安的尖叫声。 @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的每个非曼德拉草生物必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:40]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 生物承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 生物承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。只要该生物仍处于恶心状态，该缓慢状态值就不能降低到 1 以下。

Swarming Bites.name: 集群啃咬 Swarming Bites
Swarming Bites.description: 每个处于集群空间内的敌人受到@Damage[7d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true]豁免），并且暴露在曼德拉草集群毒液中。一次成功的豁免能避免中毒。

Mastiff Of Tindalos.name: 廷达罗斯獒犬 Mastiff Of Tindalos

Otherworldly Mind.name: 异界心智 Otherworldly Mind
Otherworldly Mind.description: 当一个生物将廷达罗斯猎犬作为心灵效果的目标，该生物受到@Damage[8d6[mental]]伤害（@Check[type:will|dc:33|basic:true]豁免）。大失败时，它还将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ][[/br 1d4 #Confused Duration]]{1d4轮}。

Ripping Gaze.name: 撕裂凝视 Ripping Gaze
Ripping Gaze.description: 30 尺。廷达罗斯猎犬的眼睛凶恶地发光，在被其可怕的凝视盯着的生物的身体上造成疼痛但不会流血的伤口。当一个生物在灵光范围内结束回合，它将受到@Damage[8d6[slashing]]伤害（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:33|basic:true]豁免）。豁免大成功的生物将暂时免疫24小时。

Vulnerable to Curved Space.name: 曲线空间易伤 Vulnerable to Curved Space
Vulnerable to Curved Space.description:
当廷达罗斯猎犬没有与一个带有90°（或更锐利角度）角的结构相邻时，它的物理抗力就会被抑制并将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。它不能从恶心状态中恢复，但是该状态会在猎犬与某个合适角度再次相邻时自动结束。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.V60TWjo1G1r5ZtPM]{效果：曲线空间易伤}

Angled Entry.name: 角度入口 Angled Entry
Angled Entry.description:
廷达罗斯猎犬施放7环级@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]法术，但是必须将自身传送到一个结构或其周围环境带有90°（或更锐利角度）角相邻的空间。例如，它可以传送到与一堵墙相邻的空间（使用墙和地板间的夹角），或是一个房间的拐角处，或是与一株笔直于地面生长的大树相邻，但开阔的平原和只有圆角和弧边的房间就不行。

每天一次，猎犬可以使用此能力异界传送（Plane Shift）到时间维度或从时间维度传送出，遵循上文所述相同的角度限制。

Mastiff Of Tindalos.publicNotes:
干瘦敏捷，廷达罗斯猎犬捕捉着那些篡改时间流，穿越时间，使用魔法或稀有炼金药物来将他们的思维或意识投射到过去或未来之人。强大的施法者可以使用稀有的仪式来抵达时间维度，但这样做只会引起猎犬们的愤怒，因此以此等仪式旅行之人很少能够活得足够久来传播他们的知识。尽管猎犬拥有极端狡猾且残忍的智力，但它们很少与其他生物互动——除了狩猎和摧毁那些引起他们那坚定不移的注意力的生物。

一旦猎犬捕捉到了某个需要狩猎的凡人的气息，它就会呼唤其他同类。这个团体会穿越一切空间和时间来追捕受害者，直到抓住，杀死并吞下他们。那些被追捕者只能通过避开所有角度来逃脱，因为廷达罗斯猎犬可以在任何时间跨越虚无而至。

Megaloceros.name: 大角麋鹿 Megaloceros
Megaloceros.publicNotes:
大角麋鹿与麋鹿形态相似，但提醒却要大得多。通常的雄性都是高大的生物，仅鹿角就接近100磅重。这些鹿角非常巨大，并且其宽度可能要胜过它们的体长。大角麋鹿站立时高达9英尺，重达1500磅，鹿角超过12英尺宽。

麋鹿是强壮而又敏捷的陆地哺乳动物，分布在整个失窃之地之中。

Furious Charge.name: 愤怒猛冲 Furious Charge
Furious Charge.description: 大角麋鹿行走两次，然后进行一次鹿蹄打击。如果此次打击命中，它造成额外@Damage[2d4[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Melianse.name: 蜜莲丝 Melianse
Melianse.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Wild Empathy.name: 野性认同 Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: 蜜莲丝能够使用交涉技能来对水栖或水生动物进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]或者对他们提出简单的请求。

Grant Desire.name: 赐予愿望 Grant Desire
Grant Desire.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 蜜莲丝能够复制任意3环级法术或者引发任何强度相当于3环级法术的效果，但这只能在回应非精类生物的请求或愿望时才能够生效。已经被赋予愿望的生物永远无法再次从蜜莲丝的赐予愿望能力中获益。

Minognos-Ushad.name: 米诺瑙斯-厄什德 Minognos-Ushad

Savage.name: 残暴 Savage
Savage.description:
触发 被米诺瑙斯-厄什德@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]的生物在逃脱的检定中掷出大失败

效果 米诺瑙斯-厄什德对触发生物作出1次尾刺打击。

Powerful Dive.name: 猛力俯冲 Powerful Dive
Powerful Dive.description: 米诺瑙斯-厄什德至多以其飞行速度进行飞行，并且必须同时向前移动至少20尺和下降至少10尺。若在她移动结束时，至少有1名与她体型相同或更小的敌人在她的近战触及范围内，她就能做出1次爪抓打击对抗该敌人。若爪抓命中，她能够以自由动作自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]目标或将其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{击倒}。

Punishing Momentum.name: 俯冲余威 Punishing Momentum
Punishing Momentum.description:
需求 一个生物在这个回合内被米诺瑙斯-厄什德用猛力俯冲@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]

效果 米诺瑙斯-厄什德能在用爪子握住该生物的同时以最多半速飞行，带着该生物移动并在移动结束时将其丢下。或者，她也能够选择用其尾刺打击该生物，此次攻击获得+2环境加值。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: 米诺瑙斯-厄什德喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:60]的毒素。锥形区域内的生物承受@Damage[20d6[poison]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true]豁免）。米诺瑙斯-厄什德在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

Wyvern Venom.name: 双足飞龙毒 Wyvern Venom
Wyvern Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[5d6[poison]]伤害(1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[6d6[poison]]伤害(1轮)

阶段3 @Damage[8d6[poison]]伤害(1轮)

Minognos-Ushad.publicNotes:
双足飞龙是一种带毒的龙兽，他在暴躁和侵略性上有着广泛的名声。双足飞龙体长可达15尺，重达1000磅，他那强韧的躯体使得自身能在较低的风险下用爪子袭击大型猎物。双足飞龙会先用撞击将猎物击晕，再对其注入猛毒或直接捕获到悬崖的另一侧。这是因为双足飞龙缺乏把猎物完整拖回自己巢穴的力量，所以他们更愿意把受害者抬起来丢进沟壑或峡谷中，让重力把尸骸分解成块再取走自己需要的部分。

双足飞龙对沟通没什么兴趣，因为这种生物只会在嘲弄猎物、提出对土地的宣称或要求贡品时开口。即便如此，许多双足飞龙还是会欣赏残酷的幽默和关于暴力行为的故事，尤其是当犯下这些行为的人亲自讲述之时。如果能满足双足飞龙对肉、娱乐和宝藏的需求，他们有时也会同意提供一定幅度的协助，从指路到作为坐骑侍奉强大的类人生物均有可能。然而，在双足飞龙的自尊、恶意或傲慢驱使他离开或背叛盟友之前，这种安排的持续时间很难超过几个星期之久。只有真正的暴君能够长期奴役双足飞龙，因为这些生物是如此自私，他们会尽可能地避免帮助他人。

这些贪婪、野蛮、受本能驱使的龙兽是原始的龙类怪物，他们从块头更大的表亲那里继承了部分恐怖的力量，但却没保留多少它们的狡诈（若有的话）。尽管相比真龙来说，龙兽更弱、更慢、且做事缺乏动机，但对于他们周遭的生物和城镇来说，已经算是十足的威胁了。龙兽倾向于结成狩猎队伍，一种被称作“暴掠团（Rampages）”的小型社交组织，这使得他们变得更为危险；一支河栖龙兽组成的暴掠团能快速毁灭临河的村庄，而徘徊的沙漠龙兽暴掠团对篷车商队来说宛如天灾。

尽管龙兽的栖息地与能力多种多样，但他们有数个共通的体貌特征来使自身结成一个物种。举例来说，龙兽没有前肢，因此当他们要在近战范围发动攻击的话，只能使用强有力的巨颚和布满鳞片的粗壮尾巴。大多数龙兽都倾向于避免近战，更愿意从猎物头顶飞过，从舒适的距离利用喷吐武器造成大范围的破坏。最后，所有龙兽都蕴藏着少量古代龙类先祖的力量，这让他们能爆发出令人难以置信的速度。

Murder of Crows.name: 贪食鸦群 Murder of Crows

Enraged Cunning.name: 愤怒的狡诈 Enraged Cunning
Enraged Cunning.description: 贪食鸦群在追捕猎物时能穿过大多数障碍。简单的门闩、未设栅栏的烟囱、随意合上的百叶窗，以及类似的障碍很难挡住贪食鸦群。贪食鸦群能够自动穿过此类简单的障碍，而且能尝试@Check[type:thievery|dc:25]检定穿过更加复杂的障碍（如关闭的窗户或者简易隔板）。

Swarming Beaks.name: 群鸦的盛宴 Swarming Beaks
Swarming Beaks.description: 愤怒鸦群的喙会对集群占据空间内的每名敌人造成@Damage[2d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免）。在豁免中大失败的生物会由于鸦群针对目标面部的攻击而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}[[/br 1d6 #Rounds]]{1d6轮}。

Murder of Crows.publicNotes:
群聚的渡鸦本来就以刻薄无情而为人所知，而这种色彩在一帮渡鸦决定分工协作的时候就更为浓重了。在大多数情况下，乌鸦群不会攻击更大的敌人，但当它们被超自然力量或因为饥饿导致的绝望操纵时，无情的鸦群会成为致命的敌人。

很少有群居的鸟类像渡鸦那样狡猾。

Ngara.name: Ngara

Spirit Naga Venom.name: Spirit Naga Venom
Spirit Naga Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 round)

Ngara.publicNotes:
In naga culture, the foul-tempered, unkempt spirit naga holds a contemptible place similar to that of hags in humanoid cultures. These decrepit creatures live out lives of solitude, sought out only by those who are foolish or brave enough to think they can benefit from the spirit naga's powers without paying a heavy price-for most who dare to show such hubris, the price is their own lives.

Spirit nagas seek out desolate ruins and places long associated with death and corruption. These sinister, serpentine beings can be found in abandoned graveyards, crumbled fortresses, rotting swamps, and blighted woodlands. Though they may know little of the actual history of such places, the nagas are nonetheless attracted to the psychic remnants of evil deeds and tormented spirits that remain within the earth and stones there.

Despite their hideous appearance and treatment as pariahs by other nagas, spirit nagas feel a profound pride in their abilities and even in their hermetic existences. They see themselves as connected to a greater force whose mysteries are revealed only to those who can cast off the trappings and morals of "civilized" society. Even so, spirit nagas gleefully accept the worship of other creatures willing to bow to their capricious whims. They often form cults around themselves, using their charm spells and rituals to ensnare the minds of a few key individuals who spread the nagas' foul influence throughout a community.

Nagas are identifiable by their serpentine bodies and strange, humanlike heads. All nagas have magical abilities and great intelligence, which they combine to advance their own agendas.

Nightmare Rook.name: 梦魇鸦 Nightmare Rook
Nightmare Rook.hp: 再生20（寒铁或精魂使其无效）

Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Cold Iro.name: 再生20（寒铁或精魂使其无效） Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Cold Iron or Lawful)

Wing Rebuff.name: 翼返 Wing Rebuff
Wing Rebuff.description:
触发 一个位于大鹏翼击触及范围之外的生物进入大鹏的翼击触及范围

效果 大鹏对触发生物进行一次翼击打击。如果大鹏推离目标，则目标的移动动作被打断。

Flying Strafe.name: 飞掠 Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: 大鹏以它的飞行速度飞行，并在这一行动中的任何时刻进行两次爪击打击。每次打击必须针对不同的生物。每次攻击正常计算多重攻击减值。

Snack.name: 小菜 Snack
Snack.description: 大鹏攻击被自己脚爪@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]的生物时在攻击检定上获得+2环境加值。

Snatch.name: 抓握 Snatch
Snatch.description: 大鹏用一只或两只脚爪@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]一个生物的时候能以一半的速度飞行，并带着目标一起移动。

Improved Push 10 feet.name: 精通推离10尺 Improved Push 10 feet

Nightmare Rook.publicNotes:
大鹏这种传说中体型巨大的猛禽能够捕猎大象，通常从喙到尾巴长约30尺，翼展达80尺以上。它们的狩猎策略是用它们强有力的爪子抓住猎物，然后在进食前从高处将其扔下，再用带钩的喙从骨头上撕下肉来。这种方法会产生大量的腐肉，这会导致一群见机行事食腐动物紧跟在大鹏后面，比如乌鸦和秃鹰，它们很容易就能偷偷啄食残渣。大多数情况下，大鹏并不介意这些生物，它们有时会和死掉的猎物一起被吃掉。
